ingredients: 30  chicken wing sections, 1 (12 ounce) can mango nectar,   +   1/4 cup brown sugar, 6  habanero peppers, stemmed, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sriracha hot chili sauce, 1 tablespoon rice vinegar, 1 stick butter, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons honey, 1 cup cornstarch, 2 cups vegetable oil for frying
nutrition: Total Fat 29g 37%, Saturated Fat 11g 53%, Cholesterol 80mg 27%, Sodium 367mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 19g, Vitamin C 5mg 25%, Calcium 23mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 177mg 4%
